item.description:
Are you into Fat & Happy...lol? Well, join us there for a great meal and terrific company. Come out and celebrate the upcoming HOLIDAY WEEKEND! 

 

This fairly new establishment boasts a dining experience showcasing fine cuisine and a bar that is fun and inviting. Unwind and relax with friends in the intimate dining room. Great conversation, delicious food and world class service come together to create a memorable evening.

 

Whether you're looking for a 14 oz. Steak, fresh seafood or one of their delicious signature appetizers, Fat & Happy won't disappoint. Sharing the moments of life together...the experience will make your day...you deserve it after all!

 

* This is a joint meetup with Eat, Laugh and Be Merry in West Hartford.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Terri, or Chuck's table...cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: FAT & HAPPY RESTAURANT...Our Kind Of Place!
